title: Frieze Art Fair
seo_description: WestHouse is a proud hotel partner of Frieze New York, one of the world's leading contemporary art fairs.
contents:
NEW YORK - May 5 to 8, 2016


WestHouse is a proud hotel partner of Frieze New York, one of the world's leading contemporary art fairs. Throughout the first weekend of May, Frieze New York brings together the most exciting contemporary galleries from around the globe. We invite you to make WestHouse your House away from Home during Frieze.


BOOK NOW
